detail_find_rule:
js:
rc(config.Btea)
let p={
"title":"h1&&Text;.module-info-tag&&Text",
"img":".lazyload&&data-original",
"url":".m_background&&style",
"desc":".module-info-item,1&&Text;.module-info-item,2&&Text;.module-info-item,3&&Text",
"content":".module-info-introduction-content&&Text",
"tabs":"body&&.module-tab-item:not(:contains(排序))",
"tab_text":"",
"lists":"body&&.module-play-list",
"tab_id":""
};
eval(JSON.parse(request('hiker://page/lazy')).rule)
二级.A(p,lazy)
